com.ibm.ecm.api.coresdk.model

Interface IBMECMRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<IBMECMBaseObject>, IBMECMBaseObject, Serializable

    public interface IBMECMRepository
extends IBMECMBaseObject
    Represents a repository managed in IBM Content Navigator.

    Each repository object is an instance of a given repository type defined in IBMECMRepositoryType. A repository object is globally defined and then associated with each IBM Content Navigator desktop. Each desktop usually contains a default repository. A repository is usually where authentication occurs if container managed authentication is not performed. You can login into the main application and then authenticate with additional repositories defined within the desktop.

    As of now, only a IBMECMRepositoryType.P8 is supported

    • Method Detail

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns whether this repository has been authenticated and connected.
        Returns:
        true if this repository has been authenticated and connected. The value is false until a connectToRepository(String, String, IBMECMCompletionHandler) is performed.

      • retrieveRootItem

        void retrieveRootItem(IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentItem> onComplete)
        Retrieves the root item for this repository. The root item is the starting item that content items such as folders and documents can be created in. This call also places the resulting root object into cache for use by the synchronous version of this method.

        For the root item, the starting path is always a "/".

        Parameters:
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the retrieved content item if the call is successful

      • retrieveRootItem

        IBMECMContentItem retrieveRootItem()
        Retrieves the cached root folder for this repository immediately in the same thread. If one does not exist yet in cache then the method will return null without error. Calling the asynchronous version of this method will fill or update the root object cache.
        Returns:
        The cached root folder object if present, null if not.

      • retrieveItem

        void retrieveItem(String itemIdOrFullPath,
                  IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentItem> onComplete)
        Retrieves an item using the provided unique identifier or full path. The item will only be populated with basic information. In order to obtain all information about an item, you can use retrieveItemWithAttributes(String, IBMECMCompletionHandler) or call IBMECMContentItem.retrieveAttributes(IBMECMCompletionHandler).
        Parameters:
        itemIdOrFullPath - the item's unique identifier or full path
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the retrieved content item if the call is successful

      • retrieveItem

        IBMECMContentItem retrieveItem(String itemIdOrFullPath)
        Retrieves an item using the provided unique identifier or full path synchronously. The item will only be populated with basic information. In order to obtain all information about an item, you can use retrieveItemWithAttributes(String, IBMECMCompletionHandler) or call IBMECMContentItem.retrieveAttributes(IBMECMCompletionHandler).
        Parameters:
        itemIdOrFullPath - the item's unique identifier or full path
        Returns:
        the retrieved content item

      • retrieveItemWithAttributes

        void retrieveItemWithAttributes(String itemId,
                                IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentItem> onComplete)
        Retrieves an item with all of its attributes and properties included using the provided unique identifier. This retrieval will take longer than the retrieveItem(String) since it will be returning more information.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the item's unique identifier
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the retrieved content item if the call is successful

      • retrieveCategorizedItemAttributes

        void retrieveCategorizedItemAttributes(String itemId,
                                       IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMItemProperties[]> onComplete)
        Retrieves all the attributes and properties of an item using the provided item's id. The attributes will be split into three categories in this order: system properties, user properties, item properties.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the item's unique identifier
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns an array of item properties split into different categories

      • retrieveCategorizedItemAttributes

        IBMECMItemProperties[] retrieveCategorizedItemAttributes(String itemId)
        Retrieves all the attributes and properties of an item using the provided item's id in a synchronous call. The attributes will be split into three categories in this order: system properties, user properties, item properties.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the item's unique identifier
        Returns:
        returns an array of item properties split into different categories

      • retrieveMultiItems

        void retrieveMultiItems(String[] itemIds,
                        IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMResultSet<IBMECMContentItem>> onComplete)
        Retrieves one or more items using the provided item's id. This provides a bulk and efficient way to retrieve multiple items. Use this instead of retrieveItem(String) if you need to retrieve more than one item.
        Parameters:
        itemIds - an array of all the items' ids to retrieve
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns a result set of all the content items if the call is successful

      • retrieveMultiItemsByVsIds

        void retrieveMultiItemsByVsIds(IBMECMItemVersionSeries[] versionSeries,
                               String[] itemIds,
                               IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMResultSet<IBMECMContentItem>> onComplete)
        Retrieves one or more items using the provided version series combinations. o

        If one of the items being retrieved is not versionable, such as a folder, then provide a null IBMECMItemVersionSeries object and provide a corresponding item id in the same slot.

        If all the items being retrieved are versionable, then leave the parameter itemIds null.

        Parameters:
        versionSeries - the version series combination to retrieve
        itemIds - the item id to retrieve instead of the item isn't versionable, such as a folder.
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns a result set of all the content items if the call is successful

      • retrieveContentItemAllVersions

        void retrieveContentItemAllVersions(String itemId,
                                    IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMResultSet<IBMECMContentItem>> onComplete)
        Retrieves all versions of an item using the provided item's id.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the item's unique identifier
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns a result set of all the content item's versions if the call is successful

      • retrieveContentItemAllVersions

        IBMECMResultSet<IBMECMContentItem> retrieveContentItemAllVersions(String itemId)
        Retrieves all versions of an item using the provided item's id synchronously.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the item's unique identifier
        Returns:
        a result set of all the content item's versions

      • addDocumentItem

        void addDocumentItem(String parentFolderId,
                     String teamspaceId,
                     String classId,
                     IBMECMContentSourceType contentSourceType,
                     IBMECMItemProperties properties,
                     String mimeType,
                     String fileName,
                     File file,
                     boolean addAsMinorVersion,
                     IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentItem> onComplete,
                     IBMECMProgressListener progressListener)
        Adds a new document to the repository using the provided File object as the source.
        Parameters:
        parentFolderId - the id of the folder to add the document into
        teamspaceId - the id of the teamspace to add the document into. You can pass a null if a teamspace is not involved.
        classId - the id of the document's class to add the document as
        contentSourceType - the IBMECMContentSourceType type
        properties - the properties to set when adding the document
        mimeType - the document's mime type
        fileName - the name of the file this document will be stored as
        file - the file that holds the document's content
        addAsMinorVersion - true if this document should be added as a minor version
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the newly added content item if the call is successful
        progressListener - the progress listener that notifies how many bytes have transferred. You can pass null to skip listening.

      • addDocumentItem

        void addDocumentItem(String parentFolderId,
                     String teamspaceId,
                     String classId,
                     IBMECMContentSourceType contentSourceType,
                     IBMECMItemProperties properties,
                     String mimeType,
                     String fileName,
                     InputStream inputStream,
                     boolean addAsMinorVersion,
                     IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentItem> onComplete,
                     IBMECMProgressListener progressListener)
        Adds a new document to the repository using the provided InputStream object as the source.
        Parameters:
        parentFolderId - the id of the folder to add the document into
        teamspaceId - the id of the teamspace to add the document into. You can pass a null if a teamspace is not involved.
        classId - the id of the document's class to add the document as
        contentSourceType - the IBMECMContentSourceType type
        properties - the properties to set when adding the document
        mimeType - the document's mime type
        fileName - the name of the file this document will be stored as
        inputStream - the input stream that holds the document's content
        addAsMinorVersion - true if this document should be added as a minor version
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the newly added content item if the call is successful
        progressListener - the progress listener that notifies how many bytes have transferred. You can pass null to skip listening.

        contentSourceType - the IBMECMContentSourceType type
        properties - the properties to set when adding the document
        mimeType - the document's mime type
        fileName - the name of the file this document will be stored as
        file - the file that holds the document's content
        addAsMinorVersion - true if this document should be added as a minor version
        Returns:
        the newly added content item

        void addFolderItem(String classId,
                   String parentFolderId,
                   String teamspaceId,
                   IBMECMItemProperties properties,
                   IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentItem> onComplete)
        Adds a new folder to the repository.
        Parameters:
        classId - the id of the folder class to add the folder as
        parentFolderId - the id of the parent folder to add the folder into
        teamspaceId - the id of the teamspace to add the folder into. You can pass a null if a teamspace is not involved.
        properties - the properties to set when adding the folder
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the newly added folder if the call is successful

                         String password,
                         IBMECMCompletionHandler<Boolean> onComplete)
        Connects to this repository and authenticates with the provided credentials.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id to authenticate with
        password - the password to authenticate with
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns true if successful

      • findGroups

        void findGroups(IBMECMDirectory directory,
                String searchString,
                IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMResultSet<IBMECMUserGroup>> onComplete)
        Finds and retrieves any IBMECMUserGroup objects that match the provided criteria. You can obtain the list of directories to search from using retrieveDirectories(IBMECMCompletionHandler).
        Parameters:
        directory - the IBMECMDirectory to search from
        searchString - the search string or search pattern to use
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns a result set of IBMECMUserGroup objects that match the search criteria

      • retrieveTeamspaceFolders

        void retrieveTeamspaceFolders(int pageSize,
                              IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMResultSet<IBMECMTeamspace>> onComplete)
        Retrieves the teamspace folders for this repository according to the page size defined.
        Parameters:
        pageSize - the page size for search results. If pageSize < 0, the returned result will not support page size; If pageSize = 0, the returned result will use the default size defined by server side; If pageSize > 0, the returned result will use the page size;
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns a result set of IBMECMTeamspace objects if the call is successful

                           IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMTeamspace> onComplete)

        teamspaceId - the teamspace id to retrieve
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the requested IBMECMTeamspace object if the call is successful

      • searchAdHoc

        void searchAdHoc(String searchFolderId,
                 String teamspaceId,
                 String[] searchClasses,
                 IBMECMObjectType objectType,
                 IBMECMSearchPredicate[] searchPredicates,
                 IBMECMTextSearchPredicate textSearchPredicate,
                 String orderBy,
                 boolean descending,
                 int pageSize,
                 IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMResultSet<IBMECMContentItem>> onComplete)
        Performs an-hoc search using the provided search parameters for this repository.
        Parameters:
        searchFolderId - the folder id to restrict the search scope to that folder. You can pass in null to search the entire repository instead.
        teamspaceId - the teamspace id to restrict the search scope to that teamspace. You can pass in null if this is not applicable.
        searchClasses - the ids of the IBMECMContentClass objects to search for. If you pass in ClassA and ClassB, only objects of those class instances will be returned. The classes you pass in must be of the same IBMECMObjectType types.
        objectType - the IBMECMObjectType type of items you are looking for
        searchPredicates - the list of IBMECMSearchPredicate objects to search for. These search predicates will be "ANDed" or "ORed" depending on the textSearchPredicate parameter.
        textSearchPredicate - the reference to IBMECMTextSearchPredicate that indicates whether all the searchPredicates supplied will be "ANDed" or "ORed" together.
        orderBy - the property that will sort the search results by
        descending - true to return descending search results
        pageSize - the page size for search results
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns a result set of all the search results if the call is successful

      • searchAdHoc

        void searchAdHoc(IBMECMSearchTemplate searchTemplate,
                 String teamspaceId,
                 IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMResultSet<IBMECMContentItem>> onComplete)
        Searches document and folder by using the provided IBMECMSearchTemplate object. You can create a search template by using IBMECMSearchTemplateBuilder.
        Parameters:
        searchTemplate - a reference to IBMECMSearchTemplate object that will provide the search inputs
        teamspaceId - teamspace id to restrict the search scope to that teamspace. You can pass in null if this is not applicable.
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns a result set of all the search results if the call is successful

      • moveToFolder

        void moveToFolder(String targetFolderId,
                  String sourceFolderId,
                  IBMECMContentItem[] items,
                  boolean targetFolderIsTeamspaceFolder,
                  IBMECMCompletionHandler<Boolean> onComplete)
        Moves a list of items from the provided source folder to the target folder.
        Parameters:
        targetFolderId - the target folder id
        sourceFolderId - the source folder id
        items - the list of content items to move
        targetFolderIsTeamspaceFolder - true if the target folder is a teamspace folder
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns a result set of all the search results if the call is successful

      • retrieveChangesList

        void retrieveChangesList(int pageSize,
                         long lastUpdateTS,
                         long changesSince,
                         long changesUntil,
                         int marker,
                         int[] registrationIds,
                         IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMSyncChangesList> onComplete)
        Retrieves a list of changes made to the synced items in this repository.
        Parameters:
        pageSize - the page size to be returned
        lastUpdateTS - the last update timestamp
        changesSince - the timestamp to start getting changes
        changesUntil - the timestamp to stop getting changes
        marker - the marker
        registrationIds - the registration ids
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns all the changes in the synced items

      • retrieveChangesList

        IBMECMSyncChangesList retrieveChangesList(int pageSize,
                                          long lastUpdateTS,
                                          long changesSince,
                                          long changesUntil,
                                          int marker,
                                          int[] registrationIds)
        Retrieves a list of changes made to the synced items in this repository synchronously.
        Parameters:
        pageSize - the page size to be returned
        lastUpdateTS - the last update timestamp
        changesSince - the timestamp to start getting changes
        changesUntil - the timestamp to stop getting changes
        marker - the marker
        registrationIds - the registration ids
        Returns:
        an array of all the synced items that changed

      • addSearchTemplate

        void addSearchTemplate(String name,
                       IBMECMItemPermissions permissions,
                       String searchFolderId,
                       String[] searchClasses,
                       IBMECMObjectType objectType,
                       IBMECMSearchPredicate[] searchPredicates,
                       IBMECMTextSearchPredicate textSearchPredicate,
                       String orderBy,
                       boolean descending,
                       IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentItem> onComplete)
        Adds a search template to this repository.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the search template to add
        permissions - the permissions of the search template
        searchFolderId - the folder id to restrict the search scope to that folder. You can pass in null to search this entire repository.
        searchClasses - the ids of the IBMECMContentClass of objects to search for. If you pass in ClassA and ClassB, only objects of those class instances will be returned. The classes you pass in must be of the same IBMECMObjectType types.
        objectType - the IBMECMObjectType type of items you are looking for
        searchPredicates - the list of IBMECMSearchPredicate objects to search for. These search predicates will be "ANDed" or "ORed" depending on the textSearchPredicate parameter.
        textSearchPredicate - the reference to IBMECMTextSearchPredicate that indicates whether all the searchPredicates supplied will be "ANDed" or "ORed" together.
        orderBy - the property that will sort the search results by
        descending - true to return descending search results
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the newly added search template if the call is successful

      • addSearchTemplate

        void addSearchTemplate(String name,
                       IBMECMItemPermissions permissions,
                       IBMECMSearchTemplate searchTemplate,
                       IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMContentItem> onComplete)
        Add a search template using the provided IBMECMSearchTemplate object to this repository.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the search template to add
        permissions - the permissions of the search template
        searchTemplate - a reference to IBMECMSearchTemplate object that will provide the search inputs
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the newly added search template if the call is successful

      • getCookieManager

        CookieManager getCookieManager()
        Returns the CookieManager set for this repository. A repository can have a different set of cookies if this repository is not the default repository that is used to log in for the application.
        Returns:
        the CookieManager set for this repository
